skillTree.name: Aura of Dark Majesty
skillTree.description: This Lord of Undeath projects an aura of dominion that can wilt the most iron-willed mortals.

skillTree.name: Dark Pact
skillTree.description: A dark pact has been made with darker Gods to guarantee victory.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.name: People of the Old Dynasty
skillTree.description: The summoner wrestles with the winds of magic, beckoning the long-dead people of an extinct civilization to awaken from their thousand year long slumber.

skillTree.name: Wild Heart
skillTree.description: The spellcaster attunes the magic of the wild, channelling its ancient and arcane power.

skillTree.name: The Curse of Undeath
skillTree.description: As the powers of Dark Magic are wielded for the purpose of Necromancy, its unwholesome energies invigorate the Undead.

ui_effects.description: Greatly replenishes hit points of combatants

skillTree.name: Defiance of the Old Dynasty
skillTree.description: Many early human kingdoms defied the might of the Celestial Dragon, and although many generations have now forgotten their names, the earth still remembers.

effects.description:
Leadership: +10 when fighting against Cathay
	(Lord's army)

Melee Attack: +6 for Undead Infantry and Cavalry
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Hex Wards
skillTree.description: Dabbling in the art of witchcraft placed an extreme risk upon the sorceror, for curses were a double-edged sword; any prudent sorceror would be wise to at least try to mitigate its damning effects.

skillTree.name: Cult of Forbidden Ancestors
skillTree.description: Mummified remains of their old followers rise from the shadowy underworld; ready to worship their leaders in faith many thousand years ago.

skillTree.name: Witch-Queen of Ancient Xiang
skillTree.description: Ancestor Witches were the chief shamans and elders of many early Cathayan civilizations, most notably the ancient Dynasty of Xiang, which was known for its embrace of magecraft.

effects.description: Winds of magic cost: -25% to Lore of Primeval Witchcraft spells
Cooldown: -30% to Lore of Primeval Witchcraft spells

skillTree.name: "O, Sorrow; Be Consumed"
skillTree.description: A shroud of grief blankets the subject of the curse; ill-begotten memories soon flood the mind and cripple one's desire to live.

effects.description: Winds of magic cost: -1 to "O, Sorrow; Be Consumed"

ui_effects.description: Consumes a small amount of health

effects.description: Winds of magic cost: -2 to "O, Sorrow; Be Consumed"

skillTree.name: "O, Anger; Be Brandished"
skillTree.description: The witch angrily flails the effigy around, channeling pure anger into her her incantations.

ui_effects.description: Consumes a small amount of health
Consumes a small amount of health

effects.description: Winds of magic cost: -2 to "O, Anger; Be Brandished"

skillTree.name: "O, Envy; Become Coveted"
skillTree.description: Twisted desires of jealousy and envy are poured into the curse with the intent of stripping away the victim's fortunes so harbored by its caster.

ui_effects.description: Consumes a moderate amount of health
Consumes a moderate amount of health

effects.description: Winds of magic cost: -2 to "O, Envy; Become Coveted"

skillTree.name: "O, Hatred; Become Ash"
skillTree.description: Uttering a guttural chant, the witch grits her teeth and visualizes her sworn enemies; fervently praying for their doom even at the cost of mutual destruction.

ui_effects.description: Consumes a moderate amount of health
Consumes a moderate amount of health

effects.description: Winds of magic cost: -2 to "O, Hatred; Become Ash"

skillTree.name: "O, Revenge; Be Shattered"
skillTree.description: Less of a hex and more of a brute-forced application of sorcery; the witch furiously stabs the effigy, seeking to destroy those who wronged her.

ui_effects.description: Consumes a large amount of health
Consumes a large amount of health

effects.description: Winds of magic cost: -2 to "O, Revenge; Be Shattered"

skillTree.name: "O, Death; Be Severed"
skillTree.description: Reaching into the darkest and most sinister of curses, the witch recites a word of severance, thus cutting the thread of life from the victim.

ui_effects.description: Consumes a large amount of health
Consumes a large amount of health

effects.description: Winds of magic cost: -2 to "O, Death; Be Severed"

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.name: Greater Arcane Conduit
skillTree.description: "Forces of Necromancy, hear the request of your most-studious adept: flow through me according to my will!"

skillTree.name: Aura of Supremacy
skillTree.description: "I am mighty, none dare challenge me!"

effects.description:
Enemy leadership: -4
	(enemy armies in local province)

skillTree.name: Army of the Damned
skillTree.description: "A wall of decaying flesh and bone slowly advanced towards us, implacable and utterly remorseless."

effects.description:
Melee defense: +4 for Chanters, Returned, Unearthed Laborers, and Revenants units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +3 for Chanters, Returned, Unearthed Laborers, and Revenants units 
	(Lord's army)

Melee defense: +6 for Chanters, Returned, Unearthed Laborers, and Revenants units
	(Lord's army)

Leadership +6 for Chanters, Returned, Unearthed Laborers, and Revenants units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Chanters, Returned, Unearthed Laborers, and Revenants units 
	(Lord's army)

Melee defense: +8 for Chanters, Returned, Unearthed Laborers, and Revenants units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Hunters of the Afterdark
skillTree.description: All manners of bogeys and fiends that lurk in the dark wood, idling patiently as the sun sets into the horizon -- and the night begins.

effects.description:
Speed: +5% for Fell Bats and Gore Hags units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +8% for Fell Bats and Gore Hags units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Fell Bats and Gore Hags units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +11% for Fell Bats and Gore Hags units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Fell Bats and Gore Hags units
	(Lord's army)

Bonus vs Infantry: +5 for Fell Bats and Gore Hags units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Cursed Ghosts
skillTree.description: In the East, tales of ghosts are often brought up to scare and discipline children or spread around as petty entertainment, but in crumbling abodes and forgotten clanhouses, lingering spirits exist, languishing in murderous rage.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% for Spirit Host, Starved Marquis, Accursed Diao Si Gui and Pale Lady units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +15% for Spirit Host, Starved Marquis, Accursed Diao Si Gui and Pale Lady units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +4% for Spirit Host, Starved Marquis, Accursed Diao Si Gui and Pale Lady units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +20% for Spirit Host, Starved Marquis, Accursed Diao Si Gui and Pale Lady units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +6% for Spirit Host, Starved Marquis, Accursed Diao Si Gui and Pale Lady units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Spirit Host, Starved Marquis, Accursed Diao Si Gui and Pale Lady units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Monsters of the Nether
skillTree.description: The Cathayan underworld is home to many immetarial creatures, and some of these aren't as benevolent as Cathay's venerated ancestors.

effects.description:
Physical resistance: +6% for Mogwai, Yaoguai, Devil of Dark Omen, and Underworld Gate Guardian units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +7 for Mogwai, Yaoguai, Devil of Dark Omen, and Underworld Gate Guardian units
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: +8% for Mogwai, Yaoguai, Devil of Dark Omen, and Underworld Gate Guardian units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +9 for Mogwai, Yaoguai, Devil of Dark Omen, and Underworld Gate Guardian units
	(Lord's army)

Magic resistance: +12% for Mogwai, Yaoguai, Devil of Dark Omen, and Underworld Gate Guardian units
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: +10% for Mogwai, Yaoguai, Devil of Dark Omen, and Underworld Gate Guardian units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Revenant Heroes
skillTree.description: "Charge, brothers! We are sworn-comrades in life, and now, in DEATH! For Xen Yang! For the Dragon Emperor!"

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +6 for Youxia Revenants units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for Youxia Revenants units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +9 for Youxia Revenants units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +7 for Youxia Revenants units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Youxia Revenants units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Eastern Terrors
skillTree.description: Grandy Cathay is home to many supernatural abominations that stalk the night and maliciously feast upon the populace's nightmares.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for Jiangshi, Blood Lions and Cursed Jade Carriage units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Jiangshi, Blood Lions and Cursed Jade Carriage units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +8 for Jiangshi, Blood Lions and Cursed Jade Carriage units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +15% for Jiangshi, Blood Lions and Cursed Jade Carriage units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +10% for Jiangshi, Blood Lions and Cursed Jade Carriage units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +11 for Jiangshi, Blood Lions and Cursed Jade Carriage units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Dead of the Orient
skillTree.description: The endurance of boogeymen and other nightly frights that haunt the Cathayan psyche is perhaps one of the more intriguing aspects of their culture.

effects.description:
Armour +8 for Chanters, Returned, Unearthed Laborers, Revenants, Blood Lions and Jiangshi units(Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: +10% for Chanters, Returned, Unearthed Laborers, Revenants, Blood Lions and Jiangshi units(Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Cruel Souls
skillTree.description: Not only satisfied in enacting revenge, some spirits go as far as to inflict misery and torment upon the living out of misplaced wrath and perceived injustices.

effects.description:
Bonus vs Infantry: +7 for Spirit host, Starved Marquis, Accursed Diao Si Gui, Pale Lady, and Underworld Gate Guardian units(Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Spirit host, Starved Marquis, Accursed Diao Si Gui, Pale Lady, and Underworld Gate Guardian units(Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Nightmares of the Dark
skillTree.description: At sunset, when all the windows are barred and the crows have cawwed, the dread denizens of the night encroach upon the world of mortals from the shadows.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for Fell bats, Gore Hags, Mogwai, Devil of Dark Omen and Yaoguai (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +9 for Fell bats, Gore Hags, Mogwai, Devil of Dark Omen and Yaoguai (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Parade of Midnight
skillTree.description: Deathless horses with eyes that burn like brimstone and hooves that leave trails of ghostflame; the jade banner flashes its accursed colors.

effects.description:
Missile resistance: +15% for Youxia revenants and Cursed Jade Carriage units(Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +8% for Youxia revenants and Cursed Jade Carriage units(Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: The Restless Dead
skillTree.description: A Lord of Necromancy's minions do not suffer exhaustion, they can walk for leagues and never suffer.

skillTree.name: Undying Horde
skillTree.description: Once slain in battle, the foe belongs to the Undead Lord, and will rise again, eager to serve.

effects.description: The Dead Rise Again: +5% hit points for destroyed units restored after battle
The Dead Rise Again: +10% hit points for destroyed units restored after battle
The Dead Rise Again: +15% hit points for destroyed units restored after battle

skillTree.name: Children of the Night
skillTree.description: A powerful, vigorous Lord of Darkness will see the Children of the Night gather unto them.

effects.description:
Character experience gain: +10%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

Character experience gain: +30%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Darkling Skies
skillTree.description: The sun is no ally of the dead - a sky scorched black, or darkest night, will invigorate the Unliving.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Ancient Cunning
skillTree.description: Such long-lived creatures develop a level of guile that mortals cannot match.

skillTree.name: Immortal Horror
skillTree.description: Such a beast is all but impossible to destroy - an immortal horror doomed to haunt eternity!

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Guile & Glamour
skillTree.description: A simple glamour can disguise a monstrous Vampire or Liche, so they may then charm and beguile the local populace.

skillTree.name: Necrarch
skillTree.description: W'soran's scions are masters at the art of Necromancy, to dabble in such will be a boon.

skillTree.name: Eternal Warden
skillTree.description: This Lord has endless forbearance, a timeless patience crafted over millennia.

effects.description:
Attrition: -5% when under siege
	(armies in local owned region)

Attrition: -10% when under siege
	(armies in local owned region)

Attrition: -15% when under siege
	(armies in local owned region)

skillTree.name: Uncanny Prescience
skillTree.description: This Lord can hear the thoughts of mortals for leagues around, and plan accordingly.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve minimum: +15
	(Lord's army)

backgroundSkills.name: Dark Majesty
backgroundSkills.description: "Glory in your dark majesty, my lord."

backgroundSkills.name: Devious
backgroundSkills.description: Vampires and their liche-servants are devious creatures; manipulative with many mortal servants in their thrall.

effects.description:
Hero action cost: -10%
	(Heroes in local province)

Hero action success chance: +5%
	(Heroes in local province)

backgroundSkills.name: Dread Incarnate
backgroundSkills.description: "They will tremble, my lord, oh, they will fear!"

effects.description:
Enemy leadership: -4
	(enemy armies in local province)

backgroundSkills.name: Lore Keeper
backgroundSkills.description: Once forbidden knowledge is acquired, Necromancers and Vampires will jealously guard it from rivals' eyes.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +1 per turn
	(own army)

Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +8
	(own army)

backgroundSkills.name: Master of the Black Arts
backgroundSkills.description: A master indeed - to rival the Great Necromancer himself?

effects.description:
Miscast base chance: -10% for all spellcasters
	(local region)

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fightâ€¦ or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +10%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.name: Determined
backgroundSkills.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Weapon Master
backgroundSkills.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

backgroundSkills.name: Strategist
backgroundSkills.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

backgroundSkills.name: Tactician
backgroundSkills.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

ui_effects.description: Consumes a small amount of health
